snippet.title: Tiny Echo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Tiny Echo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/629770/Tiny_Echo/

Take a walk in the ethereal realm and deliver messages to the spirits. Make your mark in the wordless narrative - with a Tiny Echo. Explore a mysterious world and solve puzzles at a tranquil pace to uncover new locations and characters. A lovingly crafted, hand-drawn world with quirky inhabitants awaits your arrival.

Main features
Guide the courier Emi through a quirky hand-drawn world.
Uncover the unique traits of each character to complete your delivery.
Solve puzzles at a meditative and calm pace.
Relax with an atmospheric and soothing soundtrack composed by Mount West.
Enter a wordless narrative as you progress in your odd postal round.

Explore the indie games from Might & Delight here:
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/mightanddelight/
